ccnbasicconfig.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * @file ccnbasicconfig.c
00003  * Bring up a link to another ccnd.
00004  *
00005  * This is a very basic version that just registers a single prefix, possibly
00006  * creating a new face in the process.  Symbolic proto, host, and port are not
00007  * handled.  You might want to consider looking at ccndc instead.
00008  *
00009  * A CCNx command-line utility.
00010  *
00011  * Copyright (C) 2009-2010 Palo Alto Research Center, Inc.
00012  *
00013  * This work is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00014  * the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 as published by the
00015  * Free Software Foundation.
00016  * This work is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00017  * WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
00018  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
00019  * for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public
00020  * License along with this program; if not, write to the
00021  * Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor,
00022  * Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA.
00023  */
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 #include <string.h>
00027 #include <unistd.h>
00028 #include <ccn/bloom.h>
00029 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00030 #include <ccn/ccnd.h>
00031 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00032 #include <ccn/uri.h>
00033 #include <ccn/face_mgmt.h>
00034 #include <ccn/reg_mgmt.h>
00035 #include <ccn/sockcreate.h>
00036 #include <ccn/signing.h>
00037 #include <ccn/keystore.h>
00038 
00039 static void
00040 usage(const char *progname)
00041 {
00042     fprintf(stderr,
00043             "%s ccnx:/prefix/to/register proto host [port]\n"
00044             "   Bring up a link to another ccnd, registering a prefix\n",
00045             progname);
00046     exit(1);
00047 }
00048 
00049 #define CHKRES(resval) chkres((resval), __LINE__)
00050 
00051 static void
00052 chkres(int res, int lineno)
00053 {
00054     if (res >= 0)
00055         return;
00056     fprintf(stderr, "failure at "
00057                     "ccnbasicconfig.c"
00058                     ":%d (res = %d)\n", lineno, res);
00059     exit(1);
00060 }
00061 
00062 int
00063 main(int argc, char **argv)
00064 {
00065     struct ccn *h = NULL;
00066     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00067     struct ccn_charbuf *null_name = NULL;
00068     struct ccn_charbuf *name_prefix = NULL;
00069     struct ccn_charbuf *newface = NULL;
00070     struct ccn_charbuf *prefixreg = NULL;
00071     struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf = NULL;
00072     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = NULL;
00073     struct ccn_charbuf *templ = NULL;
00074     const unsigned char *ptr = NULL;
00075     size_t length = 0;
00076     const char *arg = NULL;
00077     const char *progname = NULL;
00078     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcobuf = {0};
00079     struct ccn_face_instance face_instance_storage = {0};
00080     struct ccn_face_instance *face_instance = &face_instance_storage;
00081     struct ccn_forwarding_entry forwarding_entry_storage = {0};
00082     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry = &forwarding_entry_storage;
00083     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00084     struct ccn_charbuf *keylocator_templ = NULL;
00085     struct ccn_keystore *keystore = NULL;
00086     long expire = -1;
00087     int ipproto;
00088     unsigned char ccndid_storage[32] = {0};
00089     const unsigned char *ccndid = NULL;
00090     size_t ccndid_size = 0;
00091     int res;
00092     int opt;
00093     
00094     progname = argv[0];
00095     while ((opt = getopt(argc, argv, "h")) != -1) {
00096         switch (opt) {
00097             case 'h':
00098             default:
00099                 usage(progname);
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     /* Sanity check the URI and argument count */
00104     arg = argv[optind];
00105     if (arg == NULL)
00106         usage(progname);
00107     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00108     res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, arg);
00109     if (res < 0) {
00110         fprintf(stderr, "%s: bad ccn URI: %s\n", progname, arg);
00111         exit(1);
00112     }
00113     if (argc - optind < 3 || argc - optind > 4)
00114         usage(progname);
00115     
00116     h = ccn_create();
00117     res = ccn_connect(h, NULL);
00118     if (res < 0) {
00119         ccn_perror(h, "ccn_connect");
00120         exit(1);
00121     }
00122 
00123     newface = ccn_charbuf_create();
00124     temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
00125     templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
00126     keylocator_templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
00127     
00128     resultbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
00129     name_prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
00130     null_name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00131     CHKRES(ccn_name_init(null_name));
00132 
00133     keystore = ccn_keystore_create();
00134         
00135     /* We need to figure out our local ccnd's CCIDID */
00136     /* Set up our Interest template to indicate scope 1 */
00137     ccn_charbuf_reset(templ);
00138     ccnb_element_begin(templ, CCN_DTAG_Interest);
00139     ccnb_element_begin(templ, CCN_DTAG_Name);
00140     ccnb_element_end(templ);    /* </Name> */
00141     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_Scope, "1");
00142     ccnb_element_end(templ);    /* </Interest> */
00143     
00144     ccn_charbuf_reset(name);
00145     CHKRES(res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.M.SRV/ccnd/KEY"));
00146     CHKRES(res = ccn_get(h, name, templ, 200, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, 0));
00147     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest,
00148                               resultbuf->buf,
00149                               pcobuf.offset[CCN_PCO_B_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
00150                               pcobuf.offset[CCN_PCO_E_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
00151                               &ccndid, &ccndid_size);
00152     CHKRES(res);
00153     if (ccndid_size > sizeof(ccndid_storage))
00154         CHKRES(-1);
00155     memcpy(ccndid_storage, ccndid, ccndid_size);
00156     ccndid = ccndid_storage;
00157     
00158     face_instance->action = "newface";
00159     face_instance->ccnd_id = ccndid;
00160     face_instance->ccnd_id_size = ccndid_size;
00161     if (strcmp(argv[optind + 1], "tcp") == 0)
00162         ipproto = 6;
00163     else if (strcmp(argv[optind + 1], "udp") == 0)
00164         ipproto = 17;
00165     else
00166         ipproto = atoi(argv[optind + 1]);
00167     face_instance->descr.ipproto = ipproto; // XXX - 6 = tcp or 17 = udp
00168     face_instance->descr.address = argv[optind + 2];
00169     face_instance->descr.port = argv[optind + 3];
00170     if (face_instance->descr.port == NULL)
00171         face_instance->descr.port = CCN_DEFAULT_UNICAST_PORT;
00172     face_instance->descr.mcast_ttl = -1;
00173     face_instance->lifetime = (~0U) >> 1;
00174     
00175     CHKRES(res = ccnb_append_face_instance(newface, face_instance));
00176     temp->length = 0;
00177     CHKRES(ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, "%s/.ccnx/.ccnx_keystore", getenv("HOME")));
00178     res = ccn_keystore_init(keystore,
00179                             ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp),
00180                             "Th1s1sn0t8g00dp8ssw0rd.");
00181     CHKRES(res);
00182 
00183     ccnb_element_begin(keylocator_templ, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo);
00184     ccnb_element_begin(keylocator_templ, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator);
00185     ccnb_element_begin(keylocator_templ, CCN_DTAG_Key);
00186     CHKRES(ccn_append_pubkey_blob(keylocator_templ, ccn_keystore_public_key(keystore)));
00187     ccnb_element_end(keylocator_templ); /* </Key> */
00188     ccnb_element_end(keylocator_templ); /* </KeyLocator> */
00189     ccnb_element_end(keylocator_templ);    /* </SignedInfo> */
00190     sp.template_ccnb = keylocator_templ;
00191     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR;
00192     sp.freshness = expire;
00193     ccn_charbuf_reset(temp);
00194     res = ccn_sign_content(h, temp, null_name, &sp,
00195                            newface->buf, newface->length);
00196     CHKRES(res);
00197     
00198     /* Create the new face */
00199     CHKRES(ccn_name_init(name));
00200     CHKRES(ccn_name_append_str(name, "ccnx"));
00201     CHKRES(ccn_name_append(name, ccndid, ccndid_size));
00202     CHKRES(ccn_name_append(name, "newface", 7));
00203     CHKRES(ccn_name_append(name, temp->buf, temp->length));
00204     res = ccn_get(h, name, templ, 1000, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, 0);
00205     if (res < 0) {
00206         fprintf(stderr, "no response from face creation request\n");
00207         exit(1);
00208     }
00209     ptr = resultbuf->buf;
00210     length = resultbuf->length;
00211     res = ccn_content_get_value(resultbuf->buf, resultbuf->length, &pcobuf, &ptr, &length);
00212     CHKRES(res);
00213     face_instance = ccn_face_instance_parse(ptr, length);
00214     if (face_instance == NULL)
00215         CHKRES(res = -1);
00216     CHKRES(face_instance->faceid);
00217     
00218     /* Finally, register the prefix */
00219     ccn_charbuf_reset(name_prefix);
00220     CHKRES(ccn_name_from_uri(name_prefix, arg));
00221     forwarding_entry->action = "prefixreg";
00222     forwarding_entry->name_prefix = name_prefix;
00223     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id = ccndid;
00224     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size = ccndid_size;
00225     forwarding_entry->faceid = face_instance->faceid;
00226     forwarding_entry->flags = -1; /* let ccnd decide */
00227     forwarding_entry->lifetime = (~0U) >> 1;
00228     prefixreg = ccn_charbuf_create();
00229     CHKRES(res = ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(prefixreg, forwarding_entry));
00230     ccn_charbuf_reset(temp);
00231     res = ccn_sign_content(h, temp, null_name, &sp,
00232                            prefixreg->buf, prefixreg->length);
00233     CHKRES(res);
00234     CHKRES(ccn_name_init(name));
00235     CHKRES(ccn_name_append_str(name, "ccnx"));
00236     CHKRES(ccn_name_append(name, ccndid, ccndid_size));
00237     CHKRES(ccn_name_append_str(name, "prefixreg"));
00238     CHKRES(ccn_name_append(name, temp->buf, temp->length));
00239     res = ccn_get(h, name, templ, 1000, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, 0);
00240     if (res < 0) {
00241         fprintf(stderr, "no response from prefix registration request\n");
00242         exit(1);
00243     }
00244     fprintf(stderr, "Prefix %s will be forwarded to face %d\n", arg, face_instance->faceid);
00245 
00246     /* We're about to exit, so don't bother to free everything. */
00247     ccn_destroy(&h);
00248     exit(res < 0);
00249 }
